text:
Getting a COVID-19 vaccine or know someone who is?

✌️ Post a photo with the hashtag #Vaccinated.

✌️ Include a message about why you got the COVID-19 vaccine.

✌️Tag @abhayudaan and a friend who’s had a COVID-19 vaccine too for the chance to be reposted!
#India #vaccine #COVID19 https://t.co/2aUXqXpqpU
